key_risks: Regulatory and antitrust risks due to China's real estate sector scrutiny
Economic and market volatility from China's slowing real estate market
Dependence on China with limited international diversification
Data privacy concerns and compliance costs
controversies: Termination of proposed acquisition of Kongjian Zhihui due to regulatory pressures
Scrutiny over monopolistic behavior and data security in China
social_issues: Data privacy concerns impacting user trust
governance_issues: Low insider ownership (1.49%) raising concerns about management alignment with shareholders
